subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Sloppy play and poor hitting cost the Mets the first game against the Diamondbacks on Sunday, but a solid outing by Daisuke Matsuzaka, making a spot start, salvaged the second.
snippet: Sloppy play and poor hitting cost the Mets the first game against the Diamondbacks on Sunday, but a solid outing by Daisuke Matsuzaka, making a spot start, salvaged the second.
